"移動要塞型機甲種撃破":
"Mechs are running wild in the Cantera
área of planet Lillipa! Information seems
to indicate that they're being led by
a large flying mech, with similar
characteristics as the King Vardha.
All ARKS members are to enter the área
y Derrotar a Class A machine,
Vardha Soma!
――――――――――――――――――――
Fracaso: Perder en la zona final."
